trans-unit.source: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource"></xref> Web server control.
trans-unit.target: Fornece suporte de tempo de design em um designer visual para o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource"> </xref> controle de servidor Web.

trans-unit.source: In a visual designer, when you switch from Source to Design view, the markup source code that describes the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource> control is parsed and a design-time version of the control, which is just a placeholder, is created on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Em um designer visual, quando você alternar de origem para o modo de Design, o código-fonte marcação que descreve o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource>controle é analisado e uma versão de tempo de design do controle, que é apenas um espaço reservado, é criada na superfície de design.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource>

trans-unit.source: When you switch back to Source view, the design-time control, which includes the values of the properties in the **Properties** grid, is persisted to the markup source code and edited into the markup for the Web page.
trans-unit.target: Quando você alternar para a fonte de exibição, o controle de tempo de design, que inclui os valores das propriedades de **propriedades** grade, são mantidas para o código-fonte marcação e editado na marcação da página da Web.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.AccessDataSourceDesigner> class when it creates a placeholder for the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource> control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: O .NET Framework internamente constrói uma nova instância do <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.AccessDataSourceDesigner>classe quando ele cria um espaço reservado para o associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource>controle na superfície de design.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.AccessDataSourceDesigner>

trans-unit.source: Implements a designer property to shadow the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource.DataFile*> property of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Implementa uma propriedade de designer para sombra a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource.DataFile*>propriedade do controle associado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource.DataFile*>

trans-unit.source: Set the DataFile property in the designer to the name and path of the .mdb file containing the Microsoft Access database to use for the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: Definir a propriedade DataFile no designer para o nome e caminho do arquivo. mdb que contém o banco de dados do Microsoft Access a ser usado para o associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that contains the name and path of the data file associated with the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.String>que contém o nome e caminho do arquivo de dados associado a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource"> </xref>.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets the connection string that is valid at design time for the control that is associated with this designer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a cadeia de conexão é válida em tempo de design para o controle que está associado este designer.

trans-unit.source: The GetConnectionString method maps the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource.DataFile%2A> property of the control to the designer site, and then uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource.ConnectionString%2A> property of the control to generate the connection string.
trans-unit.target: O método GetConnectionString mapeia o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource.DataFile%2A>propriedade do controle para o site designer e, em seguida, usa o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource.ConnectionString%2A>propriedade do controle para gerar a cadeia de caracteres de conexão.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource.ConnectionString%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource.DataFile%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that contains the design-time connection string for the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.String>que contém a cadeia de conexão de tempo de design para o associado <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource"> </xref>.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Used by the designer to add properties to, or remove them from, the **Properties** grid or to shadow properties of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Usado pelo designer para adicionar propriedades a ou removê-los, o **propriedades** grade ou a propriedades de sombra do controle associado.

trans-unit.source: Control designers use methods that are derived from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to shadow various control properties with corresponding design-time properties that the designer implements, and to add properties to, or remove them from, the **Properties** grid.
trans-unit.target: Designers de controle usam métodos que são derivados do <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método sombra várias propriedades de controle com as propriedades de tempo de design correspondentes que implementa o designer, e para adicionar propriedades a ou removê-los, o **propriedades** grade.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource> control, the PreFilterProperties method creates the design-time <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.AccessDataSourceDesigner.DataFile%2A> property to shadow the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource.DataFile%2A> property of the control.
trans-unit.target: Para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource>controle, o método PreFilterProperties cria o tempo de design <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.AccessDataSourceDesigner.DataFile%2A>propriedade sombra a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource.DataFile%2A>propriedade do controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource.DataFile%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.AccessDataSourceDesigner.DataFile%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource>

trans-unit.source: A collection implementing the <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> of the added and shadowed properties.
trans-unit.target: Implementando uma coleção de <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>das propriedades adicionadas e sombreadas.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>
